title: SCET names Tarek Zohdi as new Academic Director
author: Keith McAleer
excerpt:
The Sutardja Center for Entrepreneurship & Technology (SCET) at the University of California, Berkeley has just named Tarek Zohdi to be its new Academic Director and member of its new Faculty Committee. Zohdi currently serves as the Will C. Hall Endowed Chair Professor in Berkeley Mechanical Engineering, Chair of the UCB Designated Emphasis for Computationalâ€¦
The post SCET names Tarek Zohdi as new Academic Director appeared first on UC Berkeley  Sutardja Center.
